CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT( Proforma_Invoice_Type__c ) ='Unit Price', Installment_due_amount_CalculatedValue__c + VAT_amount_applicable_AED__c ,Installment_due_amount_CalculatedValue__c + Oqood_Fee__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Summation of Installment Amount Applicable (AED) & VAT (AED) for Unit Price or else Summation of Installment Amount Applicable (AED) & Oqood fee (AED)
CustomField.label: Installment Amount Summation (AED)
